testcase.name: tc1

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: string "Bro" is too short (length: 3, required minimum: 5) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/C:/Users/priran/eclipse-workspace/RestAssuredPractices/target/test-classes/CreateBookingResponseJsonSchema.json#","pointer":"/properties/booking/properties/lastname"} instance: {"pointer":"/booking/lastname"} domain: "validation" keyword: "minLength" value: "Bro" found: 3 minLength: 5
Actual: {"bookingid":6830,"booking":{"firstname":"Jim","lastname":"Bro","totalprice":111,"depositpaid":true,"bookingdates":{"checkin":"2018-01-01","checkout":"2019-01-01"}}}
